member.returns: An instance of the Process class.

member.name: F:gloWord.WordDialogBoxBackgroundCloser.ShowWindowCommands.Hide
member.summary: Hides the window and activates another window.

member.name: F:gloWord.WordDialogBoxBackgroundCloser.ShowWindowCommands.Normal
member.summary: Activates and displays a window. If the window is minimized or maximized, the system restores it to its original size and position. An application should specify this flag when displaying the window for the first time.

member.name: F:gloWord.WordDialogBoxBackgroundCloser.ShowWindowCommands.ShowMinimized
member.summary: Activates the window and displays it as a minimized window.

member.name: F:gloWord.WordDialogBoxBackgroundCloser.ShowWindowCommands.Maximize
member.summary: Maximizes the specified window.

member.name: F:gloWord.WordDialogBoxBackgroundCloser.ShowWindowCommands.ShowMaximized
member.summary: Activates the window and displays it as a maximized window.

member.name: F:gloWord.WordDialogBoxBackgroundCloser.ShowWindowCommands.ShowNoActivate
member.summary: Displays a window in its most recent size and position. This value is similar to see cref="Win32.ShowWindowCommands.Normal", except the window is not actived.

member.name: F:gloWord.WordDialogBoxBackgroundCloser.ShowWindowCommands.Show
member.summary: Activates the window and displays it in its current size and position.

member.name: F:gloWord.WordDialogBoxBackgroundCloser.ShowWindowCommands.Minimize
member.summary: Minimizes the specified window and activates the next top-level window in the Z order.

member.name: F:gloWord.WordDialogBoxBackgroundCloser.ShowWindowCommands.ShowMinNoActive
member.summary: Displays the window as a minimized window. This value is similar to see cref="Win32.ShowWindowCommands.ShowMinimized", except the window is not activated.

member.name: F:gloWord.WordDialogBoxBackgroundCloser.ShowWindowCommands.ShowNA
member.summary: Displays the window in its current size and position. This value is similar to see cref="Win32.ShowWindowCommands.Show", except the window is not activated.

member.name: F:gloWord.WordDialogBoxBackgroundCloser.ShowWindowCommands.Restore
member.summary: Activates and displays the window. If the window is minimized or maximized, the system restores it to its original size and position. An application should specify this flag when restoring a minimized window.

member.name: F:gloWord.WordDialogBoxBackgroundCloser.ShowWindowCommands.ShowDefault
member.summary: Sets the show state based on the SW_* value specified in the STARTUPINFO structure passed to the CreateProcess function by the program that started the application.

member.name: F:gloWord.WordDialogBoxBackgroundCloser.ShowWindowCommands.ForceMinimize
member.summary: Windows 2000/XP: Minimizes a window, even if the thread that owns the window is not responding. This flag should only be used when minimizing windows from a different thread.

member.summary: Returns the cached ResourceManager instance used by this class.

member.name: P:gloWord.My.Resources.Resources.Culture
member.summary: Overrides the current thread's CurrentUICulture property for all resource lookups using this strongly typed resource class.

member.name: T:gloWord.My.Resources.Resources
